[http://www.smc.com/index.cfm?event=viewProduct&localeCode=EN_USA&cid=1&scid=4&pid=1441 Product page (US)]
[http://www.smc.com/files/AJ/DS_WBR14T_G.pdf Datasheet]
[http://www.smc.com/files/AR/MN_SMCWBR14T-G_EN.05.30.05.pdf Manual] "P/N: 141400520019J REV: 01" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The default SSID may be '''SMC'''. === Flash chip label === The following text was on a label on the flash chip: 
U3-17
V1.04
===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
	115200n8
	
J1	  . . . . .
	o . . . . .
	    | |   |
            RxTx  GND
{{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
